# Waterfront (Building)
## Overview
**Waterfront**

**Create** 63 Goods, 10 Influence, 56 Labor (2,680 gp) 

**Rooms** 2 [[Animal Pen (Room)|Animal Pens]], 4 Docks, 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 4 Storages, 1 [[Workstation (Room)|Workstation]] 

A port for waterborne arrival and departure, with facilities for shipping and shipbuilding.
